definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: I inquired about how many suitcases I would be allowed to bring and what the living accommodations would be.
sentences.chinese: 我询问我可以带多少个手提箱，食宿条件如何。

sentences.english: Everything in my suitcase was jumbled together.
sentences.chinese: 我手提箱里的一切都混在一起了。

sentences.english: She reached down, picked up a suitcase, and put it back in the van.
sentences.chinese: 她弯下腰，拎起一个手提箱放回货车里。

sentences.english: A suitcase is enough to take your clothes with you on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 一只手提箱足够装得下度假时替换的衣服。

sentences.english: TOMMY: Ken, you get the first run of counterfeit cash TOMMY: and put three mil in briefcases.
sentences.chinese: 肯，你先去准备假钞，然后放个三百万到手提箱内。

sentences.english: He had left his case on the 4∶40 train.
sentences.chinese: 他把手提箱丢在4点40分的火车上了。

sentences.english: Oh, can I keep this little suitcase as hand-luggage?
sentences.chinese: 哦，那我可以把这个小手提箱随身携带吗？

sentences.english: Okole gave him a suitcase and promised to follow on the next flight.
sentences.chinese: Okole给他一个手提箱，并保证乘下一航班跟来。

sentences.english: This size of the suitcase is perfect for 2-day tour.
sentences.chinese: 这种大小的手提箱最适合用在两天一夜的旅行。
耙标签粘铁在你的手提箱上。

sentences.english: A knob-shaped handle for opening and closing a door.
sentences.chinese: 他把手提箱从这只手换到另一只手。

sentences.english: One of my suitcases hasn’t come out yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还有一个手提箱没出来。

sentences.english: Keep the paperwork inside a briefcase or your office.
sentences.chinese: 把没完成的工作文件放在手提箱里或留在办公室里。

sentences.english: Could you leave your suitcase at the Bell Captain's Desk?
sentences.chinese: 请把手提箱寄放在领班服务台好吗？

sentences.english: She checked her suitcase in at the service desk.
sentences.chinese: 她在服务台把手提箱寄存起来。
